controller

Class GameViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameViewController

  • public class GameViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the view objects and listeners for game play.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameViewController(int[] input)
      Game View Controller is instantiated with inputs generated by the menu controller, indicating number of players and decks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createNewGame(javafx.stage.Stage menuStage)
      Collects Player names and instantiates a new game, a game loop and a new game view.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameViewController

        public GameViewController(int[] input)
        Game View Controller is instantiated with inputs generated by the menu controller, indicating number of players and decks.
        Parameters:
        input - a list of two ints, the first indicating the number of decks, and the second the number of players.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewGame

        public void createNewGame(javafx.stage.Stage menuStage)
        Collects Player names and instantiates a new game, a game loop and a new game view.
        Parameters:
        menuStage - menuStage, to be able to return to menu stage after game.
